function.name: sqlite3_blob_open
function.parameter_list: ( sqlite3* db, /* The database connection */ const char *zDb, /* The attached database containing the blob */ const char *zTable, /* The table containing the blob */ const char *zColumn, /* The column containing the blob */ sqlite_int64 iRow, /* The row containing the glob */ int flags, /* True -> read/write access, false -> read-only */ sqlite3_blob **ppBlob /* Handle for accessing the blob returned here */ )
